title: Pixquare Halloween Sale
content:
If you have not purchased Pixquare, it is time to do that now.
Get Pixquare now for 33% off.
Applied to all purchases from Oct 30 to Nov 01
(Those who already own Pixquare full access can ignore this promotion :D)

title: Just a heads-up
content:
There is a known issue where you cannot import/open a file from outside of Pixquare if the app is not already running.
The root cause has been identified and fixed. It will be resolved in the next update.

In the meantime, you can work around this by opening the app first before attempting to open/import files from outside of Pixquare.
Thank you for understanding
